About Us

VitaLink Behavioral Health Services, LLC is a group practice which aims to bring mental health, physical health, and financial guidance services to Maplewood and Essex County residents under one roof.

You are sure to find a connection for your needs with at least one of our counselors or coaches. All of our counselors and coaches are independent contractors. Our counselors are licensed professionals in the field of mental health. Our range of certified coaches vary in niches such as executive coaching, relationship coaching, and life coaching.

While working on your mind and spirit, you may be compelled to drop into our health and wellness classes and workshops or even work with our financial coaches who work as financial advisors and planners and are able to assist with simple budgets to wealth management and estate planning. *Payments are due at the time of counseling or coaching appointments.
